gipsy.title: Make your moments vibrate with
gipsy.accordion1Content: Gipsy Sueño blends Flamenco, Latin and Gypsy music, creating a vibrant atmosphere that makes your event unforgettable. They have enchanted prestigious events like those of Maserati and weddings at Camp Nou.
gipsy.accordion2Content: Their passionate and dynamic performances captivate your guests, guaranteeing a festive atmosphere. Gipsy Sueño is the preferred choice for exclusive evenings.
gipsy.accordion3Content: Gipsy Sueño adjusts their music to match the atmosphere and style of your event, offering a personalized touch. They have adapted to the expectations of high-level events.

testimonials.title: Our Clients
testimonials.description: Discover the testimonials of our satisfied clients
testimonials.text1: We did a day trip from Marrakech. The guide was super friendly and very professional. Everything was perfectly organized. I highly recommend Atlas For Events!
testimonials.text2: Exceptional service from start to finish. The team adapted to our needs and created an unforgettable tailor-made trip. Thank you for these magical moments in Morocco!
testimonials.text3: Impeccable organization for our corporate seminar. The attention to detail and professionalism of the team made this event a total success!

about.description: Atlas For Events is an award-winning event agency, specializing in creating unique experiences in Morocco. With one of the most influential communities in luxury event planning, we help our clients create unforgettable moments.
about.trustedGuideDesc: We provide reliable advice to help you plan your events effectively.
about.missionVisionDesc: Connecting people to positive experiences through memorable events.
about.destinationsDesc: Destinations worth the visit! Here are some popular places
about.ourServicesDesc: We offer a wide range of services to meet all your event needs

servicesPage.title: Exceptional
servicesPage.description: Atlas For Events accompanies you in all your projects with a complete range of high-end services, designed to create memorable experiences.
servicesPage.excursionsDesc: Turnkey trips and guided excursions through Morocco's most beautiful landscapes.
servicesPage.excursionsLongDesc: Discover Morocco differently without the hassle of planning! Enjoy our turnkey trips, already prepared for you. From imperial cities to desert landscapes, let us guide you through Morocco's hidden treasures.
servicesPage.eventsDesc: Custom event planning: weddings, birthdays, private parties.
servicesPage.eventsLongDesc: Your big day starts with us! Whether it's small gatherings or large celebrations, we orchestrate every detail with care to ensure the success of your event. From planning to execution, trust us.
servicesPage.activitiesDesc: Dive into unique Moroccan experiences full of conviviality.
servicesPage.activitiesLongDesc: Immerse yourself in a unique experience with a wide range of activities, full of conviviality and good mood. From thrills to cultural discoveries, every moment is an invitation to wonder.
servicesPage.activityFeature1: Sunset dinner in the Agafay desert
servicesPage.activityFeature2: Buggy adventure in the palm grove
servicesPage.activityFeature4: Hot air balloon flight over Marrakech
servicesPage.accommodationDesc: Elegant and comfortable stays in Morocco's most beautiful establishments.
servicesPage.accommodationLongDesc: Enjoy elegant and comfortable stays with breathtaking views! From private apartments to luxury villas, including desert camps, we select the best accommodations for you with private chef, 24/7 security service and local assistance.
servicesPage.spaDesc: Medical and aesthetic treatments for a holistic approach to wellness.
servicesPage.spaLongDesc: These treatments offer a holistic approach to wellness, combining physical therapy, skincare and aesthetic enhancements to revitalize body and mind. From traditional hammam to Hydrafacial treatments, treat yourself to a moment of serenity.
servicesPage.transportDesc: All-in-one transport solutions: rental, driver and airport transfers.
servicesPage.transportLongDesc: With Atlas For Events, you benefit from an all-in-one solution, without worrying about the cost or availability of transport. Wide range of vehicles, professional drivers and airport pickup for a serene journey.
servicesPage.deliveryDesc: International delivery service for your Moroccan artisanal products.
servicesPage.deliveryLongDesc: Have you fallen in love with our Moroccan artisanal products? Our international delivery service ensures that your precious purchases arrive at your door in perfect condition, wherever you are in the world.

boutique.title: Wrought Iron
boutique.description: Discover our unique collection of iron sculptures, created by talented Moroccan artisans. Each piece is an authentic work of art.
boutique.collectionDesc: Each sculpture tells a story, forged with passion by our artisans.
boutique.adjustFilters: Try adjusting your filters to see more products.
boutique.craftDescription: Our iron sculptures are created by passionate Moroccan artisans who perpetuate ancestral know-how. Each piece is unique, handcrafted with care and precision.
boutique.ctaDesc: Contact us for custom orders, international delivery quotes or any questions about our works.

product.notFoundDesc: This product does not exist or has been removed.
product.taxIncluded: Tax included • Shipping calculated at checkout
product.shareExperienceDesc: Have you purchased this product? Leave a review to help other customers.

extendedDesc.story: Each piece is unique, shaped by the expert hands of our Moroccan artisans who perpetuate ancestral know-how passed down from generation to generation. This sculpture embodies the soul of Moroccan craftsmanship, where each hammer strike tells a story of passion and dedication.
extendedDesc.materials: Made from recycled iron and salvaged mechanical parts, this work demonstrates our commitment to sustainable art. The metal is carefully selected, cleaned, then transformed into a unique artistic creation. The patinated finish is achieved through traditional techniques that give each piece its distinctive character.
extendedDesc.care: To preserve the beauty of your sculpture, we recommend regular dusting with a soft, dry cloth. Avoid direct exposure to excessive humidity. A light application of linseed oil once a year will help maintain the patina's shine. For outdoor use, additional rust treatment is recommended.

reviewData.review1Content: This sculpture is absolutely magnificent! The quality of the craftsmanship is exceptional. It proudly sits in my living room and all my guests admire it. Fast delivery and careful packaging.
reviewData.review2Content: I am impressed by the level of detail and impeccable finish. You can really feel the Moroccan expertise. It's a gift for my wife who fell in love with it immediately.
reviewData.review3Content: Beautiful quality, matches the photos. The only small drawback is the slightly long delivery time, but it was worth it. I recommend!
reviewData.review4Content: I fell for this piece during a trip to Morocco and I'm delighted to have found it here. Moroccan craftsmanship at its best. Every detail is carefully crafted.

refund.intro: At Atlas For Events, we are committed to providing you with quality experiences and products. This policy outlines our refund and return conditions.
refund.servicesContent1: Event service bookings (weddings, excursions, activities) are subject to our cancellation policy. Cancellation must be made at least 7 days before the scheduled date for a full refund.
refund.servicesContent2: For cancellations made between 3 and 7 days before the event, 50% of the amount will be refunded. No refund is possible for last-minute cancellations (less than 3 days).
refund.productsContent1: Sculptures and artworks can be returned within 14 days of receipt, provided they are in their original condition and original packaging.
refund.productsContent2: Return shipping costs are the customer's responsibility, except in cases of manufacturing defects or errors on our part.
refund.processStep1: Contact us by email or WhatsApp to initiate a refund request
refund.processStep2: Provide your order number and the reason for the request
refund.processStep3: Wait for our confirmation and return instructions if necessary
refund.processStep4: The refund will be processed within 7-14 business days
refund.exceptionsContent: Certain items cannot be returned: personalized products, special promotion items, or services already consumed.
refund.contactContent: For any questions about our refund policy, contact us at

privacy.intro: Atlas For Events is committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use and protect your personal information.
privacy.collectionContent1: We collect information you provide directly: name, email, phone number when booking services or purchasing products.
privacy.collectionContent2: We also collect browsing data automatically: IP address, browser type, pages visited.
privacy.useItem3: Improve our services and your experience
privacy.protectionContent: We use appropriate security measures to protect your information against unauthorized access, modification or disclosure.
privacy.sharingContent: We never sell your personal data. We may share it with trusted partners only to provide our services (payments, delivery).
privacy.cookiesContent: Our site uses cookies to improve your browsing experience. You can manage your cookie preferences in your browser settings.
privacy.rightsItem4: Object to the processing of your data
privacy.contactContent: For any questions about this policy or your data, contact us at

spaPage.heroSubtitle: Medical and aesthetic treatments for a holistic approach to wellness
spaPage.benefit1Desc: A complete approach combining physical therapy, skincare and aesthetic enhancements to revitalize body and mind.
spaPage.benefit2Desc: Each treatment aims to enhance your natural features, from improving skin texture to lash enhancement.
spaPage.benefit3Desc: The combination of therapeutic treatments and facial rejuvenation offers a relaxing experience that reduces stress.
spaPage.treatment1Desc: Steam bath followed by black soap and ghassoul scrub
spaPage.treatment2Desc: Advanced facial treatment to improve skin texture and radiance
spaPage.treatment3Desc: Relaxing full body massage with organic argan oil

livraisonPage.heroDescription: Have you fallen in love with our Moroccan artisanal products, but wondering how to bring them home safely? Don't worry, we have the perfect solution!
livraisonPage.introP1: Our international delivery service ensures that your precious purchases arrive at your door in perfect condition, wherever you are in the world.
livraisonPage.introP2: Whether you've chosen large pieces, fragile items, or simply can't carry your purchases with you, our delivery service takes care of everything. Enjoy Moroccan craftsmanship hassle-free!
livraisonPage.advantagesTitle: The advantages of our delivery service
livraisonPage.advantage1Desc: Careful packaging and maximum protection for your fragile and precious items.
livraisonPage.advantage3Desc: Track your package in real time until delivery.
livraisonPage.advantage4Desc: Additional insurance option for complete peace of mind.
livraisonPage.advantage5Desc: We take care of everything, you just have to enjoy.
livraisonPage.alreadyShopped: Have you already shopped with us?
livraisonPage.discoverProducts: Before booking your delivery, we invite you to discover our two unique product categories:
livraisonPage.artworksDesc: Unique artistic creations made from automotive parts.
livraisonPage.craftsDesc: Traditional Moroccan artisanal products, crafted with passion.
livraisonPage.formInsuranceYes: Yes, I would like to add insurance
livraisonPage.formFileLabel: Attach a file (photo of items, invoice, etc.):
livraisonPage.formFileFormats: Accepted formats: images, PDF, Word (max 10 MB)
livraisonPage.contactDesc: Our team is available to answer all your questions about our international delivery service.
